titleStmt.title: Whereas the carriers between the University of Oxford, and the city of London to the great prejudice of the members of the said University, and others have for divers years last past exacted what rates they pleased for the carriage of goods and letters ...
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.
Bathurst, Ralph, 1620-1704.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from the first four lines of text.
Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
